document.heading: Income Tax Secured Bond Authorization Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-46, the “Income Tax Secured Bond Authorization Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-256. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2013, and Sept. 17, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 4, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-185 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-46 became effective on December 5, 2013.
